To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Maximum _max;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_max = MAX(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_max.IsReady)
{
    var current = _max.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.max = self.MAX(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.max.IsReady:
    current = self.max.Current.Value
